summary.description: This data entity provides meta data about the first mile farm data

exportDate.description: Date when the data has been exported from the database into first-mile-farm-data-schema
exportDate.title: Export date

dataProvidersID.description: Legal registration number of the organisation that converted its data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
dataProvidersID.title: Legal registration number of the data provider

dataProvidersName.description: Official name of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format
dataProvidersName.title: data provider name

dataProvidersGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schemaindicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd
dataProvidersGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the data provider

datasetDescription.description: Description of the data set that is converted into first-mile-farm-data-schema
datasetDescription.title: Dataset description

dataProvidersPointofContact.description: Contact point of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
dataProvidersPointofContact.title: data provider point of contact

dataProvidersAdress.description: The legally registered address of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema.
dataProvidersAdress.title: data providers lega; adress

summary.title: Meta_data
